特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.

第1回: Introductions and setting out of course goals and expectations. Each student will give a short self introduction.
第2回: Unit 1: It's nice to meet you.
第3回: Unit 1: It's nice to meet you.
第4回: Unit 2: Who are you talking about?
第5回: Unit 2: Who are you talking about?
第10回: Unit 5: How do I get there?
第11回: Unit 5: How do I get there?
トピック.授業計画1: Students it is best if you have a laptop computer and a portable device available simultaneously. Be sure you can access Google Classroom.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to prepare for class and when appropriate review. Students are required to bring their textbook, a pen or pencil, paper, and a laptop or mobile to access Google Classroom. Students, please prepare for the online learning environment if necessary

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: The student’s grade will be based on quizzes, writing assignments, and oral presentations. Final vocabulary test administered in the last class online. Those students who miss five or more classes during the term will receive 0 points for this course.

name: 【150】英語II（コミュニケーション）　１８／English II (Communication)
担当者: ディチコ　ニック（DI CICCO NICK）
